text: What about someone who has [received] an explanation from his Lord and to whom a witness from Him is reciting while MosesÂ´ book lies before him as a token and a mercy? Such persons believe in it. Anyone from the factions who disbelieve in it will have the Fire for his appointment, so do not be in any quandary about it; it is the Truth from your Lord, even though most men do not believe so
